page.title: 15Landscove School
page.content: The Primary School here is for children aged 5 to 11 years.It was built in 1854 with a donation from Louisa Champernowne of Dartington Hall.The old school log which is housed in Exeter tells us of eighty-two children present.The school then catered for children up to 12 years and there were two'monitors'and the 'Master'. The Headmaster is Mr.Symons ,the Infant Teacher is Mrs.J.Brown and there are 32 children.The older children collected all the information for this survey. The largest number of children ever on roll was 105 when many evacuees were billetted locally in 1941 during the bombing of London. Miss Bright was then head ,and Mr.J.Steele succeeded her .With parents help the school thrives.
